backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI branding and SEO metadata update tasks with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend source files used as reference for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO, Open Graph, Twitter metadata, fonts, and branding for Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling all marketing sections into the main page layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/AboutS: Marketing section showing four feature cards explaining why users should choose the service.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact section featuring WhatsApp CTA, location, availability details, and a styled card layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer with branding, quick links, services list, social icons, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Responsive sticky header with branding, navigation links, scroll behavior, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Hero.t: Hero section with headline, stats, image, and scroll-to-services plus WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Highli: Displays three highlight cards for service types using icons and short descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Shows two detailed cards comparing in-parlour and home service options with feature lists.
Grid of service cards listing beauty, makeup, hair, skincare, and grooming offerings.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhatsA: Button component that opens a prefilled WhatsApp chat using configured phone number.
frontend/src/config/whatsapp.ts: Exports WhatsApp config with phone number placeholder and default prefilled message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for static content.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining brand color palette, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a beauty parlour marketing website and listing implemented features like services, WhatsApp CTAs, layout sections, and theme setup.
